00048 class CSwordBackend : public SWMgr {
00049 public:
00054   enum moduleOptions {
00055     footnotes,
00056     strongNumbers,
00057     headings,
00058     morphTags,
00059         lemmas,
00060         hebrewPoints,
00061         hebrewCantillation,
00062         greekAccents
00063     };
00064   struct moduleOptionsBool {
00065     bool footnotes;
00066     bool strongNumbers;
00067     bool headings;
00068     bool morphTags;
00069         bool lemmas;
00070         bool hebrewPoints;
00071         bool hebrewCantillation;
00072         bool greekAccents;
00073     };
00074     struct displayOptionsBool {
00075         bool lineBreaks;
00076         bool verseNumbers;
00077     };
00078   enum errorCode {
00079         noError,
00080         noSwordConfigFile,
00081         noSwordModuleDirectory,
00082         noSwordModuleConfigDirectory,
00083         noModulesAvailable,
00084         unknown
00085     };
00086 
00092     CSwordBackend();
00096     virtual ~CSwordBackend();
00103   virtual ListCSwordModuleInfo* getModuleList() const;
00109   virtual const errorCode initModules();
00115   virtual const bool shutdownModules();
00122   virtual void setOption( const CSwordBackend::moduleOptions type, bool enable);
00123 
00124   void setAllModuleOptions( const CSwordBackend::moduleOptionsBool options);
00125 
00126   void setAllDisplayOptions( const CSwordBackend::displayOptionsBool options);
00132   virtual const bool isOptionEnabled( const CSwordBackend::moduleOptions type);
00136     virtual void Load();
00140   virtual const QString getCurrentBooknameLanguage() const;
00144   const bool setBooknameLanguage( const QString& language );
00150   virtual CSwordModuleInfo* findModuleByDescription(const QString& description);
00156   static const QString findModuleNameByDescription(const QString& description);
00162   CSwordModuleInfo* findModuleByName(const QString& name);
00166   SWConfig* getConfig() const;

00177   const QString getModulePath( const QString moduleName );
00181   const QString getOptionName( const CSwordBackend::moduleOptions option);
00185   const QString getConfigOptionName( const CSwordBackend::moduleOptions option);
00189     const CSwordBackend::moduleOptionsBool getAllModuleOptions();
00190

00211 };

00214 inline ListCSwordModuleInfo* CSwordBackend::getModuleList() const {
00215     return m_moduleList;
00216 }
00217 
00219 inline SWConfig* CSwordBackend::getConfig() const {
00220     return config;
00221 }
00222 
00224 inline const QString CSwordBackend::getCurrentBooknameLanguage() const {
00225     return QString::fromLatin1(LocaleMgr::systemLocaleMgr.getDefaultLocaleName());  
00226 }
00227 
00229 inline const bool CSwordBackend::setBooknameLanguage( const QString& language ){
00230     LocaleMgr::systemLocaleMgr.setDefaultLocaleName( language.local8Bit() );
00231     return true;
00232 }
